'Methylcyclohexane' is a colourless liquid with a faint benzene-like odour. Its
molecular formula is C 7H 14 . Methylcyclohexane is used in
organic synthesis and as a solvent for cellulose ethers. It is a component of
jet fuel and is also a component of correction fluids.
